entry.data:
CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR, COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
